name: Duotone Reloaded
description:
Duotone Reloaded is the classic platformer with pixel art style with very hard levels.

Run, jump and get all the coins to go to the next level, it is a short game but very difficult to finish, it challenges you to be very precise in your movements, at first glance it seems to be a very simple game, but be careful, sometimes what is too simple can be complicated.

Duotone Reloaded unlike other platforms, its levels are carefully made, taking into account each pixel of space you move through.

Controls:

You can use WASD or Arrows to move.

C: Change the Camera.

S: Save your position ( on Noob mode )

Features:
- 3 game modes, Hard, Normal and Noob.
- 2 camera modes.
- Challenging levels.
- Comfortable and transperent control to improve visibility.
- Supports gamepads.

Requirement:
This game requires OpenGL ES 3.0 or higher.
